apps.title: Scoopz: Real Life, Real Videos
apps.description:
Scoopz is a social video app made for people who want to share true, unscripted stories. Whether you’re showing what’s happening in your neighborhood, sharing life tips, family moments, funny pets, or covering local news, Scoopz gives you a place to create short videos about what matters to you. Here, every story counts — big or small.

Create without a script. Find your people. Grow your voice.

On Scoopz, everyone can be a creator. You don’t need special equipment or experience. Just open the app and capture what’s real to you. We give you simple tools and real support—no fluff, just what helps you share and connect.

What you can do with Scoopz:

- Capture Life as it Happens: Jump into Creation Mode from anywhere and share your honest moments—no planning required.
- Grow at Your Own Pace: Keep track of your videos, followers, and engagement easily, with a dashboard that makes sense.
- Take On Creative Challenges: Try our timely “Challenges” to spark fresh ideas and make videos around trending or meaningful topics. It’s a fun way to get involved and see what others are making, too.
- Join Circles: Browse or join “Circles”—community spaces for sharing and discovering videos on specific topics. It’s a great way to find others who get your interests, or to start your own conversation around something you care about.
- Find Your Audience: Our “For You” feed helps your stories reach people who will appreciate them—whether it’s funny, heartfelt, or important.
- Your Opinion Matters: Scoopz isn’t a one-way street. Share your feedback and ideas right inside the app—we’re building Scoopz together.

A Community Built on Real Stories

At Scoopz, it’s not about chasing trends or perfection. We believe the best connections start with what’s real. If you’ve got a story to tell—no matter your style or experience—there’s a place for you here.

raw_data.description:
Scoopz is a social video app made for people who want to share true, unscripted stories. Whether you’re showing what’s happening in your neighborhood, sharing life tips, family moments, funny pets, or covering local news, Scoopz gives you a place to create short videos about what matters to you. Here, every story counts — big or small.

Create without a script. Find your people. Grow your voice.

On Scoopz, everyone can be a creator. You don’t need special equipment or experience. Just open the app and capture what’s real to you. We give you simple tools and real support—no fluff, just what helps you share and connect.

What you can do with Scoopz:

- Capture Life as it Happens: Jump into Creation Mode from anywhere and share your honest moments—no planning required.
- Grow at Your Own Pace: Keep track of your videos, followers, and engagement easily, with a dashboard that makes sense.
- Take On Creative Challenges: Try our timely “Challenges” to spark fresh ideas and make videos around trending or meaningful topics. It’s a fun way to get involved and see what others are making, too.
- Join Circles: Browse or join “Circles”—community spaces for sharing and discovering videos on specific topics. It’s a great way to find others who get your interests, or to start your own conversation around something you care about.
- Find Your Audience: Our “For You” feed helps your stories reach people who will appreciate them—whether it’s funny, heartfelt, or important.
- Your Opinion Matters: Scoopz isn’t a one-way street. Share your feedback and ideas right inside the app—we’re building Scoopz together.

A Community Built on Real Stories

At Scoopz, it’s not about chasing trends or perfection. We believe the best connections start with what’s real. If you’ve got a story to tell—no matter your style or experience—there’s a place for you here.

Ready to start sharing? Download Scoopz and grow your story in a community that values what’s true.

apps.title: Video FX: Movie Clip Editor
apps.description:
Create stunning videos in a snap with the Video FX app. Video FX is a powerful one-click video effects studio that lets you transform your videos into cinematic masterpieces – right from your phone! With our app, it has never been easier to create and edit videos perfect for any occasion or platform.

You don’t have to be a professional video editor to make stunning videos. With Video FX, your get 10+ new animations and video enhancements perfectly designed to look professional and fun! Explore tons of cool effects like autumn leaves, falling snow and anamorphic lens flares to give your videos a completely new look!

We know video editing also requires great music to complement your masterpiece. With the Video FX app, you can add music and dazzling special effects to your iMovie, TikTok, Instagram and Youtube videos. It just takes one click to add beautifully crafted music effects to any video.

Best of all, our app is incredibly easy to use. With just a single tap you can apply dazzling filters and awesome music effects made to elevate your videos. Here’s how to get started:

Step 1: Import a video from your camera roll, including Vine, Hyperlapse, Flipagram, Instagram or Dubsmash videos.
Step 2: Add effects from our library of LIVE animations with just a tap.
Step 3: You’re all set – Just save, export and share!

No more complicated design sites or video editing software. With just a few taps, you can start spicing up your videos without all of the complications and stress. Get Video FX for FREE today and start making the videos of your dreams!

KEY FEATURES:

VIDEO EFFECTS
Choose from 10+ handcrafted effects to elevate your videos, including:
- Cherry Blossoms: Instantly create a romantic atmosphere
- Party Time: Add 3D confetti to your party videos
- Dandelions: Give your video a cool and refreshing feel
- Film Damage: Add an aged film effect to your videos instantly
- TV Glitch: Enhance your video with the  TV glitch effect for a cool, retro feel
- Color Frames: Apply simple and beautiful dynamic frames to your videos
- And so much more!
- Whatever your creative vision is, you get complete customization from start to finish!

MUSICAL EFFECTS
- Add music to your videos, whether you want to lip-sync, add background music or make an AMV
- Enhance your videos with sound effects for the perfect social media posts

VIDEO EDITING
- Merge multiple video clips to combine scenes and visuals easily
- Add text to videos to elevate your lip-sync videos, music videos, or videos of wherever your creative vision takes you!
- Add stunning overlay effects to give your videos depth

You can create amazing videos with just a few taps. Download Video FX today and start making movie magic!
==================
VIDEO FX SUBSCRIPTION PRICING AND TERMS

VIDEO FX offers two auto-renewing subscription options:

3 day trial, then $3.99/week OR
3 day trial, then $39.99/year

These prices are for United States customers. Pricing in other countries may vary and actual charges may be converted to your local currency depending on the country of residence.

• Payment will be charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase
• Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period
• Account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period, and identify the cost of the renewal
• Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user's Account Settings after purchase
• Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication, where applicable

Privacy policy: https://www.vidthug.co/privacy-policy
Terms of Use: https://www.vidthug.co/terms-of-use

apps.title: Vizmato: Video Editor & Maker
apps.description:
Create awesome videos and slideshows with this easy to use video editing app. Add filters, themes, music, effects and text to make awesome movies. Create videos on this easy to use video editor and share it with your friends on Facebook, Instagram, YouTube, Whatsapp and other social media channels! 

Download the free slideshow maker and video editing app on your iPhone or iPad now! Edit videos like a professional with Vizmato!

Some of the Vizmato’s features – 

• A Simple yet Powerful Video Editor – 
	• Choose from 20+ video themes and from 40+ awesome visual effects to add a Hollywood edge to your video
	• Clip, trim and edit videos with ease to create the perfect movie in our easy to use video editor
	• Choose your background music from 140+ Free Viztunes, or add background music of your choice while editing
	• Vizmato’s editor with a voice changer effects let’s you modulate your voice to sound like a Baby, chipmunk, ghost and more! 
	• Tell a video story and record a voiceover on your video 
	• Editor with speed control – Add a slow up or speed up effects on your video. You can also choose to reverse the video
	• Add customised text and stickers to your movie with our text editor
  
 • Amazing Slideshow Maker – 
	• Convert your photos into amazing videos! Just add your photos or videos, select a theme and add music to create an amazing video slideshow in seconds
	• Choose from our collection of curated and  royalty free music, or select your own music for your photo slideshow
	• Customise your photos, videos and text in this easy to use slideshow maker app

• HD Video Recorder with Live FX - 
	• Vizmato is your own PRO HD Video Recorder! Use it to record a video in HD with filters, themes and instant video effects applied while you record! 
	• Play music while recording to get your lip sync just right

• Watch cool user created videos!  – 
	• Watch movies made by a community of Vizmato video makers. Be an aspiring moviemaker and share your creation on the Vizmato platform

• Share it with the world – 
	• A simple one tap export in HD and sharing of your videos on Facebook, Instagram, YouTube, Twitter, Whatsapp, Vine, Snapchat or any social network of your choice.

Here’s what the reviewers have to say!
- “Vizmato is basically a dream combination of Snapchat and Instagram.” – Teen Vogue
- ”Like Instagram, but with a focus on smartphone videos.” – Macworld
- “This app makes editing videos fun and easy.” – Geektime
- “Think Instagram filters and sharing but solely for videos.” – MacNN


Vizmato PRO Subscriptions –
Remove the Watermark from all your future videos
Access PRO Visual Effects and Themes
Access Slideshow PRO features
140+ royalty free Viztunes 

Vizmato PRO subscription terms:
• A charge of $11.99 for a yearly subscription will be made to your iTunes account at the end of the 7 day Free Trial period.
• Subscription automatically renews unless auto renew is turned off at least 24 hours prior to the end of the current subscription period
• Any unused portion of the Trial period will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription
• You can manage subscriptions, including turning off auto renewal, by accessing the user’s account settings
• Terms of use: http://www.vizmato.com/pages/terms-conditions.html
• Privacy Policy: http://vizmato.com/pages/privacy.html


Follow us on – 
Twitter – https://twitter.com/Vizmato
Facebook – https://www.facebook.com/vizmato/
Instagram – https://www.instagram.com/vizmato/
YouTube – https://www.youtube.com/c/vizmato

Rate the Vizmato app on the App Store; talk to us and share your feedback at vizmato@globaldelight.com

apps.title: Video Maker - Slideshow Editor
apps.description:
VideoMaker App will turn your photos into sensational movies by adding beautiful animations and music to it for Free. It allows you to select the Theme/effects and Audio of your Choice, and allows you to create & Share your Stunning Video. 

It's never been easier to make video from images/photos by choosing one of our video effects and music from our library or choose your ownsong/Music of your choice to make most beautiful video out of your photos, and Share that amazing movements with your Friends using our inbuilt Social Sharing option.

Key Features:-
* Create Stunning Video from your Photos
* Add our in-built movie Themes and make your albums with your photos
* Add Animated backgrounds to your video
* Add Music from our in-built library
* You can choose song or music of your own choice if you wish
* You can arrange the images according to your choice
* Add Title to your Video/Photo
* Option to choose photos from your camera roll
* In-built option to share your Awesome video with social networking sites
* You can share on Facebook, Instagram, email, YouTube, Viddy etc

Steps to create your movie 
1. Select Create Project and select your Aspect Ratio and all photos from your album. 
2. Add your Favourite transition. 
3. Select your background, background
4. Select animation transition
5. Select music from music library or from our app. 
6. Add effects to photos. 
7. Enter your movie title. 
8. Click on done button to create your movie. 
9. Share with your friends(supports Facebook,Instagram, email,YouTube ,Viddy etc). 

Or 

You can use our huge collection of Themes and make movie with photos and videos too.

How Does VideoMaker App Works?
You don't need be a video editor at all to use this app. Just use our app as a movie maker. VideoMaker app will analyze your photos and focus on users automatically and creates a professional looking movie from photos that you have selected. 
It will give you an option to select effect and music according to your Choice/mood and make your video even more interesting/Compiling.

RESTORE:You can restore your paid in app purchases without paying again. 
Follow these steps
1. Open the app
2. Click on Top Right to open the Premium window
3. Click on RESTORE to re-activate your in app purchases again
4. DONE

Video Maker Premium Subscription==========================
1. Enjoy professional video maker & slideshow tools with Pro-Level Features & Amazing Members-Only Benefits.
2. Get unlimited access to all premium Slideshow maker Themes
3. Get unlimited access to all premium filters and tools
4. Patterns, colors, Stickers and Fonts
5. Get rid of ads and watermark
6. Get access to all movie style Photo and video transitions.

apps.title: TextingStory Chat Story Maker
apps.description:
Join 20 million happy users and unleash your creativity!

1. Write a text conversation in TextingStory 
2. Create a video with your story 
3. Watch it and share it

TextingStory allows you to write conversations like any messaging app, except you can switch sides by swiping left or right over the message area. You can also press the characters' names. 

Take all the time you need to write your conversations. The videos are automatically accelerated for a consistently fast-paced result!

Every keystroke is recorded, so feel free to play with corrections, hesitations, or misspellings!
This is a simple app with endless possibilities.

TextingStory pioneered a new video format in 2016 and has become wildly successful on various social media, with some users getting tens of millions of views of their videos. It has its own Know Your Meme entry and T-Mobile even reproduced it in a 2019 Superbowl ad.

TextingStory is also a popular educational app for spicing up course material or hands-on activities with students.

Get it now!

********** Frequently Asked Questions **********
If your question is not here or the answer doesn't help => iphone@yvz.fr

Q: How do I change the character's names?
A: To access their settings, make a long-press on any character in the character list.

Q: How do I change the message side?
A: Swipe over the messages area. Or tap the + or camera button, then tap "Change writing side". You can also change the side of any message in edit mode. Tap the pencil button to enter edit mode when you're not writing a message.

Q: How do I add pictures or GIFs to the stories
A: You need to purchase the Storyteller or Pro upgrade. Any purchase unlocks character pictures and the ability to send pictures or GIFs.

Q: I don't see the typing area in the videos. Why is that?
A: Check if "Show typing" is ON in the video settings.

Privacy policy: https://yvz.fr/privacy/
Terms of use: https://www.iubenda.com/terms-and-conditions/75084159

apps.title: Darkroom: Photo & Video Editor
apps.description:
Transform your iPhone and iPad into a sophisticated editing suite with Darkroom, the highly acclaimed photo and video editor designed to empower both amateur photographers and professional creators. With desktop-quality tools at your fingertips, Darkroom competes with industry giants such as Adobe Lightroom and Photoshop, delivering unparalleled editing experiences right on your mobile device.

Award-Winning App Recognitions:

Apple’s Editor’s Choice since 2018
Winner of the Apple Design Award in 2020
Best New App Winner in 2015

Why Choose Darkroom?
Advanced AI-Powered Editing: Leverage cutting-edge AI tools for precise, depth-based edits and intelligent object detection. Enhance specific elements like skies, skin tones, and landscapes with unmatched accuracy.
Versatile Editing Capabilities: From high-resolution video playback and professional 4K color grading to batch photo editing, Darkroom addresses all your creative needs with efficiency. Its comprehensive toolset includes support for RAW and ProRAW files, making it perfect for high-quality photo projects.

Professional Tools for Every Creator:
All-Inclusive Format Support: Whether managing RAW files or crafting the perfect JPEG, Darkroom provides powerful editing tools that ensure top-tier output for all photo formats.
Tailored for iPhone Photographers: With iPhone-specific enhancements, Darkroom stands out as the premier editing tool for mobile photographers, offering intuitive interfaces and seamless integration with iOS features.

Praise from Experts:
"Darkroom is one of the best apps around, offering extensive support for RAW and ProRAW photos and capabilities to batch edit photos with ease." – The Verge
"Its iPhone-specific features make Darkroom the leading editing app for iPhone photographers." – The Sweet Setup

Seamless Organization and Sharing:
Organize your photos and videos with Darkroom's advanced management tools. Create stunning collages, manage hashtags effortlessly, and share your creations with ease. Streamline your workflow and keep your collections meticulously organized, whether for personal enjoyment or professional display.

Join Our Community and Enhance Your Creative Skills:
Become a Darkroom member to access exclusive features and regular updates that keep your tools cutting-edge. Our community is a hub for sharing tips, inspiration, and creative techniques.

Get Started with Darkroom Today:
Download Darkroom and elevate your photo and video editing to professional levels. With ongoing enhancements and a focus on user-friendly design, Darkroom is dedicated to enriching your creative journey.

Subscription and Membership Details:
Manage your Darkroom+ membership in the iTunes & App Store settings. Remember, subscriptions automatically renew unless cancelled at least 24 hours before the end of the current period.

Terms and Conditions: https://darkroom.co/legal/terms.html
Privacy Policy: https://darkroom.co/legal/privacy-policy.html

apps.title: Slideshow Maker Photo Video
apps.description:
Create slideshows with SlideShow Maker Photo Video using your own photos & videos from your camera roll and add music to your video slide show!

Make your own slideshow in just a few taps choosing from a great mood collection - from happy birthday to Mother's day, celebration or family, find your own style!
Add photo, video, and music to your slideshow movie creation and share it with friends and family.

FEATURES:

1) Slideshow maker :
- Add your photos to video
- Add music to video
- Add transition, overlay and trendy filter to your slideshow video
- Change duration per photo

2) Powerful Photo Editor:
- Edit frame rate of photos, flip and rotate photos, add filters effects per photo in your slideshow
- Reorder all your photos and delete or add more photos in your video slideshow
- Using the Canvas feature to enhance your photo
- Unique movement effect for your video slideshow.

3) Perfect Customize Music:
- Import music from the music library to make a slideshow with or use a song from your own iTunes collection (subject to iTunes terms).
- Remove or cut any part of audio with precision
- Adjust your audio duration for a perfect result.
- Trim, fade-in, fade-out for audio, music.

4) High-quality slideshow video for sharing:
- Save slideshow to your library in up to HD 1080p.
- Share with your friends on Facebook, Instagram, YouTube, or other social media, and get likes from them

With our cutting-edge AI video capabilities, you can turn simple photos into dynamic clips. Picture two characters laughing each other, friends sharing a laugh over a giant hamburger, or even surreal scenes of your doodles inflating, exploding, morphing, and merging into bizarre and delightful animations. IRMO’s AI instantly animates your creations, letting your imagination run wild in motion.

 • Elevate Your Brand Presence: Need a dynamic logo reveal or a promotional clip? IRMO makes it effortless to create engaging brand videos that will stand out in any feed.

apps.title: JusTalk - Video Chat & Calls
apps.description:
JusTalk is a powerful app for voice and video calls and instant messaging. It aims to provide users with a high-quality, secure, and convenient experience for communication through voice and video calls and messaging. JusTalk offers a variety of rich features for individuals, families, and professionals to meet their communication needs. Users can connect with family, friends, and colleagues worldwide, breaking the limitations of geographical distances. It is a convenient way to interact, communicate, and share with loved ones. 

• High-Quality Voice and Video Calls
JusTalk supports ultra-high-definition voice and video calls with low-latency communication channels. This ensures clear communication with family and friends, enhancing natural interactions and detailed expressions during video calls. It facilitates real-time collaboration, discussions, and decision-making in team meetings, efficiently completing tasks.

• High-Quality Voice and Video Call Recording
During real-time ultra-high-definition voice and video calls, users can easily record essential moments with a single tap. Whether capturing precious family moments or critical business decisions, all recorded files maintain lossless voice and video quality, preserving memorable moments for users to revisit.

• Walkie Talkie (Push-to-Talk)
JusTalk supports instant voice messaging through a simple push-to-talk Walkie Talkie feature. Users can send real-time voice messages by just pressing and holding—no need to start a call. It’s perfect for quick updates in both one-on-one and group chats, making conversations faster, more natural, and hands-free.

• Real-Time Interactive Games
While engaged in ultra-high-definition voice and video calls, users can play built-in interactive games in real time. Whether in one-on-one or group calls, this feature enhances bonding and adds fun to the communication experience.

• Fun Doodling
Users can engage in real-time collaborative doodling on the screen during ultra-high-definition voice and video calls. Each stroke is synchronized in real-time on both screens, allowing for creative expression during calls and making video calls more enjoyable.

• Feature-Rich IM Chat
In addition to ultra-high-definition voice and video calls, JusTalk supports instant messaging (IM) chat with various features such as text, images, videos, voice messages, emojis, stickers, GIFs, and doodles.

• Quick Message Replies and Reactions
Users can use the "Reply" feature to respond conveniently to messages from family, friends, or group members in one-on-one or group chats.

• Sharing Life Moments
By posting "Moments," users can share the most unforgettable moments of their lives with friends and family on JusTalk, showcasing the excitement and vitality of their lives. Moments support text, images, videos, and more.

• Family-Centric Features
Together with JusTalk Kids, JusTalk provides a safe and convenient communication platform for children, parents, and family members. It enables family members to communicate anytime, anywhere, making sharing messages, photos, videos, or discussing family matters more convenient.

• Real-Time Location
Real-time location sharing allows close friends to know each other's whereabouts at any time, enhancing a sense of security. It enables friends to more intuitively participate in each other's lives, sharing daily activities and locations, fostering shared experiences, resonance, emotional connection, and building closer friendships.

Customer Service: support@justalk.com
Terms: https://justalk.com/terms.html

apps.title: Vont - Text on Videos
apps.description:
Vont is a simple app that allows you to add text to videos. 

・ More than 400 fonts are available. 
・ You can install other fonts. 
・ Text size is changeable. 
・ Text color is changeable. 
・ Text gradient is changeable. 
・ Text's stroke color is changeable. 
・ Text's shadow color is changeable. 
・ Text's background color is changeable. 
・ Text is rotatable. 
・ Text kerning is changeable. 
・ Line spacing is changeable. 
・ Curved text 
・ URL scheme: vont:// 

Try Phonto app, if you want to add text to photos. Phonto is a free app that is available on the App Store.

--------------------------------
LANGUAGE
--------------------------------
Vont supports only English (US), Chinese and Japanese, so when the priority of Chinese (or Japanese) in your setting was higher than English, Vont would be launched as Chinese (or Japanese) mode.

To solve this problem…
1. Open the Settings app.
2. Choose 'English' in 'General' > 'Language & Region' > 'iPhone Language'.
3. Turn back your 'iPhone Language' to your favorite language.

-------------------------------- 
HOW TO INSTALL FONTS 
-------------------------------- 
Using iTunes, you can copy font files between your computer and Vont on your iOS device. 

1. Select your iOS device from the Devices section of iTunes. 
2. Click the Apps tab and scroll down to the bottom of the page. 
3. Select "Vont" in the "File Sharing" section. 
4. Drag and drop .ttf or .otf font files into "Documents". 
5. Restart Vont. 

More detail about how to install fonts.
https://vont.phon.to/install_fonts


- Using videos below as screenshots
http://www.videezy.com/nature/180-red-flowers
http://www.videezy.com/abstract/160-roadtrip-abstract-stock-video

apps.title: AI Video - AI Video Generator
apps.description:
AI Video – Smart AI Video Generator, Creator, and Maker for Everyone

AI Video is an all-in-one AI video generator, creator, and maker that lets anyone generate high-quality animated videos from text and images, with features like polaroid filter videos and character actions in just a few steps.

Designed for creators, marketers, educators, and storytellers, AI Video simplifies the video creation process by combining powerful AI generation tools with an intuitive editing experience.

With AI Video, you can generate stunning visuals from a simple prompt or turn static photos into dynamic, expressive videos. Whether you want to explain an idea, promote a product, or just tell a story, AI Video empowers you with a complete AI video creation toolkit.

AI Video Generator Features Include:

AI Video is more than just a video maker — it’s a smart video generator powered by advanced AI models like Google DeepMind’s Veo3, which understands the context, emotion, and structure of your story. Just write your script or describe the scene, and AI Video will generate fully animated, emotionally rich characters and visuals that match your vision.

Join a Global Creative Community
 Thousands of creators, marketers, educators, influencers, and hobbyists around the world use AI Video daily to generate viral reels, cinematic shorts, educational explainers, and fun personal edits. Whether you’re making content for TikTok, Instagram Reels, YouTube Shorts, or just sharing with friends and family, AI Video adapts to your needs.

Why Choose AI Video as Your Generator and Creator?
 • No design or animation skills needed

 • Bring photos and illustrations to life with pic to video generation
 • Animate action figures and characters with human-like reactions

Transform your iPhone into a professional video studio with Detail, the ultimate AI video editor for content creators. Whether you're making TikTok shorts, YouTube vlogs, reels, podcasts, or Instagram stories, Detail has everything you need without complicated software.

NEW: Auto-Edit & AI Director
- AI Director: A conversational guide in the teleprompter that helps you record your story. Just talk — no prep needed.
- Auto-Edit: Automatically finds the best moments and creates ready-to-share videos, from long-form to short clips.
- Edits: Create multiple versions of your timeline in one project for different platforms.
- New Shortcuts: Jump into your next video faster with the new Shortcuts on the Home Screen.

AI Video Editing Made Easy
Say goodbye to complicated editing software. Detail's AI-powered editor helps you craft professional content in minutes. The teleprompter and Auto-Edit streamline your workflow. Create perfect cuts and transitions for vlogs, shorts, and reels ideal for TikTok and Instagram. Get unlimited recording, remote recording, captions and editing for free, upgrade to Pro to unlock our AI features like Auto Edit.

Powerful Camera Features
Detail transforms your iPhone into a professional camera:
- Multi-camera recording captures dynamic, multi-angle footage.
- Switch between front and back cameras for different perspectives.
- Create reaction videos easily—import content and convert it into social-ready shorts.
- Display video behind you for engaging commentary, tutorials, or presentations.

YouTube Vlogger's Dream
Elevate your YouTube channel:
- Create eye-catching end screens to boost subscribers.
- Use YouTube-optimized export settings for the best quality.
- Generate stand-out thumbnails to grab attention in search results.

Instagram Story & Reel Enhancer
Make your Instagram content stand out:
- Text-based editing for perfect 15-second reels and shorts.
- Pre-configured aspect ratios for seamless posting.
- Popular Instagram-style filters to maintain your aesthetic.

Podcast Production Suite
Turn your podcasting dreams into reality:
- Podcast Auto-Edit for quick, polished video podcasts.
- Record high-quality audio with iPhone microphone, Rode/DJI wireless mics, or any USB microphone.
- AI audio enhancement for clear, professional sound even in noisy environments.
- Publish to popular platforms with one tap.

Livestream with Professional Quality
Take your content live:
- Stream directly to YouTube, Twitch, Instagram, LinkedIn, Facebook via RTMP.
- Record high-quality video while livestreaming for instant editing.
- Use overlays, layouts, and multi-camera setups to enhance your live content.

Advanced Editing Tools
Take your videos to the next level:
- Green screen effects using Chroma Key technology.
- Professional motion graphics and text animation.
- Integrated teleprompter with AI Director for flawless delivery.

Captions & Subtitles
Boost engagement with AI-powered auto-captions:
- Generate captions in multiple languages for vlogs, shorts, and reels.
- Customize caption styles to match your brand.
- Add burned-in subtitles for universal accessibility.

Collaboration & Workflow
Save and share your projects to the cloud:
- Collaborate on edits and share recordings with your team.
- Keep videos, shorts, and reels organized with cloud storage.
- Upload content for private sharing or public viewing.
- Share directly to social media with just a few taps.

Create, Stream, and Edit Like a Pro
Join thousands of creators using Detail to produce stunning YouTube vlogs, TikTok shorts, video podcasts, and Instagram reels. Whether you're a beginner or experienced creator, Detail's AI-powered tools will help you craft content that captivates your audience.

Download Detail now and start recording, editing, and live streaming with ease!

raw_data.description:
Introducing VideoGPT, the groundbreaking app that allows you to transform your words into stunning video stories in seconds. With VideoGPT, the possibilities are limitless as you bring your ideas to using a range of captivating styles, from Cinematic to Anime and everything in between.

This innovative app harnesses the power of artificial intelligence to seamlessly blend your prompts with cutting-edge technology, resulting in visually striking and immersive video narratives. Whether you're an aspiring animator, a storyteller, or simply someone looking to add a touch of magic to your videos, VideoGPT is here to revolutionize your creative process.

Imagine being able to input your story and see it animated in seconds. With VideoGPT, you can effortlessly switch between different animation aesthetics to suit the mood and tone of your story, creating a truly unique and personalized experience.

The app's advanced algorithms analyze your prompts and generate high-quality animations that accurately capture your creative intent. The attention to detail is remarkable, ensuring that each frame is meticulously crafted while staying true to the chosen style. From the vibrant colors and fluid movements of Anime to the polished and emotive storytelling of Pixar, VideoGPT empowers you with artistic versatility like never before.

VideoGPT's intuitive interface makes it easy for anyone, regardless of their technical expertise, to navigate and use the app. The powerful AI engine running in the background takes care of the intricate animation process, allowing you to focus solely on unleashing your imagination.

Step into a realm where creativity knows no bounds. VideoGPT is the ultimate tool for storytellers and animators who seek to push the boundaries of their craft. Let your ideas flourish, your characters come alive, and your stories captivate audiences in ways you've never dreamed possible.

Download VideoGPT today and unlock the door to a world of limitless creativity and unparalleled visual storytelling. 

SUBSCRIPTIONS:

- You can subscribe to a PRO account
- Subscription options are 1-week and one year.
- Subscription automatically renews for the same price and duration period as the original, "one month", "one-year" package unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period
- Payment will be charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase
- Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user's Account Settings after purchase
- Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication, where applicable

apps.title: Video rotate + flip video easy
apps.description:
Introducing Video Rotate & Flip - the ultimate video editing app that empowers you to effortlessly rotate and flip your videos with precision and creativity! Whether you're a social media enthusiast, a content creator, or just someone who loves capturing memorable moments on camera, this app is your go-to solution for adding that perfect twist to your videos.

**********************
****  FEATURES: *****
**********************

Intuitive Video Rotation: Tired of sideways or upside-down videos? With Video Rotate & Flip, you can easily correct the orientation of your videos with a simple tap. Effortlessly rotate your footage clockwise or counterclockwise to ensure your content always looks polished and professional.

Flip Horizontally & Vertically: Unleash your creative prowess by flipping your videos horizontally or vertically. Bring a fresh perspective to your content and create mesmerizing effects that captivate your audience. The flip feature adds a touch of uniqueness and flair to your videos that will leave a lasting impression.

Easy-to-Use Interface: Video Rotate & Flip boasts an intuitive and user-friendly interface, making it accessible to users of all experience levels. Whether you're a novice or a seasoned video editor, you'll find the app seamless and enjoyable to use.

High-Quality Output: Our app ensures that your videos retain their original quality even after editing. Share your polished creations on social media platforms, video sharing sites, or with friends and family, knowing that they'll enjoy the same stunning visual experience you intended.

Video Toolbox: Merge, Trim, Crop, Reverse, Convert videos using this app. One place for all you video editing needs.

Save & Share with Ease: Save your edited videos directly to your device's gallery or share them instantly on popular social media platforms like Instagram, Facebook, YouTube, and more. 

No Watermarks: Unlike other video editing apps, Video Rotate & Flip is free from watermarks. Your videos are yours to keep and share without any intrusive logos or marks.

Note: Videos are rotated frame wise. So the rotation is permanent and they are compatible with all video players on different platforms (Mac/PC/Other).


Our App can be used for free with Ads and limited features, however, you can purchase a Bulk Video Rotate Premium subscription for the additional advanced features, and remove Ads.

SUBSCRIPTION AND TERMS:

When you download our App you can opt in to a 3 days free trial for monthly and 7 days free trial for yearly subscription. Our App offers auto-renewing monthly/yearly subscription options for access to the app's features and content. Your Bulk Video Rotate Premium subscription will automatically renew at the end of each term and payment will be charged through your iTunes account. You can turn off auto-renew at any time from your iTunes account settings but refunds will not be provided for any unused portion of the term. To avoid renewal, you must cancel at least 24 hours before your subscription or trial ends. Your account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period. Any unused portion of a free trial period will be forfeited if you purchase a subscription.

SUBSCRIPTION PRICING:

Premium Monthly: $1.99 / Month (3 days free trial)
Premium Yearly: $12.99 / Year (7 days free trial)

Read more about our terms, conditions, and privacy here:

• Privacy Policy: https://www.racersoft.in
• Terms of Use: https://racersoft.in/terms-of-use/

raw_data.releaseNotes:
Regular updates
Minor bug fixes 
Performance Improved
UI updated

apps.title: Easy Video Merger - Join Vids
apps.description:
This application allows you to easily combine videos.
Let's combine the memories of events and trips you have taken a lot of pictures of into one video.

You can also combine videos for a specified number of seconds at a time.
Videos can be easily rearranged by dragging.
You can choose from a variety of output video sizes, including 16:9 portrait, square, and 3:4 landscape.

apps.title: Video Editor .
apps.description:
Video Editor is a hot video editing and creating app.
Now has millions of users around the world.
Even the new beginners can easily create and edit a great video in 1 minute. Whether you’re looking to make a full film or be the next YouTube hot creator, Video Editor offers you the tools to make your videos shine.

WHY YOU'LL LOVE THIS APP
- It is full-featured editing functions, winning many video editing software, and become the popular choice for many YouTubers.
- Multi-audio synthesis, support for adding multiple music, recording, and sound effects to the same video;
- A variety of professional photographers’ favorite filters.
- Tons of stickers to really make your videos stand out.
- Hundreds of popular songs help you to turn your video into a masterpiece.

EASILY CROP YOUR VIDEOS
- Easily crop the video clips you want, accurate to 1s.
- Includes Clip, Cut and Split, which is very suitable for beginners to use.

POWERFUL MUSIC EDITING FUNCTION
- Rich music and sound effect material library to make your video more outstanding.
- Extract audio from other videos, use your own video, and edit
- Hundreds of popular music songs that can be used on YouTube are available.
- You can also import your favorite songs from iTunes over video as background music.
- You can easily dub videos and make blockbuster movies with your voice.
- Edit background music, you can drag to change music playback position and add multiple music at the same time.

ADD TEXT & STICKERS
- Type your own text with color and various fonts.
- Bring your videos to life with cute stickers.

ADJUST VIDEO ASPECT RATIOS AND DIRECTIONS
- Multiple frame sizes: including YouTube, Instagram video sizes, 4:3, 1:1 and 9:16.
- Rotating your videos in 90 degree to adjust the video direction is supported.

MERGE VIDEOS AND PHOTOS
- Combine multiple clips into one to make your own unique videos.
- Create interesting slideshows and videos from your photos.
- Choose your favorite transition to style your video and slideshows.

ADJUST SPEED
- Adjust playback speed for fast or slow motion.

CAREFULLY-SELECTED FILTERS
- Tons of carefully-selected filters to cater to all your needs no matter you're looking for documentary effects or artistic expression.

COPY VIDEOS
- One-click copying makes it easy to edit repeating clips.

SAVE HD VIDEO
- Save videos to your camera roll in high quality output.
- Share right to YouTube, Facebook, Instagram, TikTok and other pop app.
Don’t wait! Join Video Editor, the top video editing app, to make stunning videos easily.
If you have any problems, please feel free to contact us: videoeditorteam@163.com.

Video Editor PRO SUBSCRIPTION
- Membership Benefits: Unlock all VIP features.
- Subscription Period: 1 month (Pro membership continuous monthly product), 12 months (Pro membership continuous annual product). If needed, we also provide one-time payment services other than existing subscription plans.
- Subscription Prices: Prices may vary based on iAP application information, e.g., $4.49 per month for continuous monthly product, $27.49 per year for continuous annual product.
- Payment: Users confirm purchase and make payments through their iTunes account.
- Canceling Renewal: To cancel renewal, please manually disable the auto-renewal feature in iTunes/Apple ID settings management at least 24 hours before the current subscription period ends.
- Renewal: Apple iTunes account will be charged within 24 hours before expiration. Upon successful payment, the subscription period will be extended by one subscription period.
- Free Trial for Annual Members: Renewing or canceling renewal during the free trial period will not revoke the trial benefits. Users can continue to use the trial until the trial period ends.

User Agreement: https://videoeditor.principlebits.com/web/UserAgreement/
Privacy Policy: https://videoeditor.principlebits.com/web/PrivacyPolicy/
EULA: https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/

Unleash your imagination with VideoMax, the ultimate AI video editor powered by the world’s leading generative video models. Whether you want to animate a photo, bring your story to life from a single prompt, or create viral AI effects in seconds, VideoMax makes it effortless.
Turn ideas into visuals. Turn photos into motion. Turn creativity into magic.

Key Features:
-  AI Video Models Choose from cutting-edge models like Hailluo, Kling, Runway, Veo 2, and Veo 3 for high-quality, AI-powered video generation.
-  AI Magic Effects Turn your photos into fun, dynamic clips—add muscles, explosions, fireworks, and more. Break the rules of reality and go viral with one tap.
- Text to Video Type an idea and watch it become a cinematic visual. No editing skills needed—just pure imagination.
- Image to Video: Animate still images into eye-catching videos. From portraits to product shots, turn anything into a visual story in seconds.

Ready to bring your vision to life? Download VideoMax and create your first AI masterpiece today.
